DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-blinded , match control study young athlete ( age 10-28 year old ) collegiate sport . The cohort define accordance athlete 's exposure injury . All subject complete minimum one recording base assigned cohort . Concussed athletes complete additional 3 week follow-up recording post injury . The symptomatic evaluation , physical examination , neurological baseline testing , BrainPulse recording enter database determine clinical outcome ass device utilization .
DOC.brief_title: Unblinded Data Collection Study Concussion Using BrainPulse
DOC.detailed_description: Cohort I define enrol athlete University Wyoming divide two sub-cohorts : Cohort Ia include athlete participate Division 1 Athletics ; Cohort Ib athletes subscribe Head Health Network . Cohort II define injured athlete participate team include two sub-cohorts : Cohort IIa define non- concuss injured athlete ; Cohort IIb concuss athlete per reference standard .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female young athlete age 1828 yr 2 . Enrolled University Wyoming currently participate Division 1 Athletics 3 . Completed follow baseline test : SWAY balance , KingDevick , C3Logix 4 . Willing able participate study evaluation allow access medical testing record 5 . Signed informed consent , legally authorize representative willing provide inform consent behalf subject subject minor 1 . Prior concussion diagnose physician last 2 week assess via interview athlete ( include recent concussion within last 3 day ) 2 . Any serious medical , social psychological condition opinion investigator would impair ability provide inform consent otherwise disqualify patient participation
